pages.title: Cave Racer
pages.text: The species is native to the eastern and southeastern regions of Asia.$(br2)It is a long, thin, semi-arboreal species of snake with several recognized subspecies.

pages.title: Cave Racer
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
